A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie breaks away from some Star Wars cliches and delivers a breath of fresh air to the franchise. The Force Awakens is perhaps more exciting\, but this one is certainly more original. Still\, the core elements that make us love Star Wars are still there\, so die hard fans can still delight. Some of the subplots are weak\, some characters are underused and the movie is a bit too long - but\, all in all\, it's a good movie. Certainly better than the prequels and\, for some\, maybe even a new classic.
